links.title: Exclusive: Tesla developing self-driving tech for semi-truck, wants to test in Nevada
links.description: Tesla Inc is developing a long-haul, electric semi-truck that can drive itself and move in "platoons" that automatically follow a lead vehicle, and is getting closer to testing a prototype, according to an email discussion of potential road tests between the car company and the Nevada Department of Motor Vehicles (DMV), seen by Reuters.

$TSLA Tesla's plans for new electric semi truck have been leaked. https://stocknews.com/news/tsla-first-tesla-inc-tsla-semi-truck-details-emerge/

links.title: First Tesla Inc (TSLA) Semi Truck Details Emerge
links.description: Tesla Inc (NASDAQ:TSLA) is inching closer to a prototype of an advanced electric-powered semi truck, and is in talks with state motor vehicle agencies to begin testing soon. According to correspondence uncovered by Reuters, Tesla is developing a long hauly electric semi truck that's self-driving and can move in platoons with a lead truck commanding the followers.

links.title: TSLA | Analysts Are Bullish on Tesla Stock Thanks to Model 3
links.description: The Model 3 is expected to increase the margins for Tesla, as a result of which analysts are bullish on its TSLA stock. Stock trading is all about preparing for the bad news, making the right moves, and waiting for the good news. There is nothing like a bullish picture to lighten up investors.
